parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the airbag system can lead to the failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a collision, potentially causing serious injury or death. Additionally, the airbags may deploy randomly, causing unexpected and potentially hazardous situations.
symptoms: Dashboard warning lights or notifications indicating "Airbag System Malfunction" or "Airbag Malfunction. Have the vehicle inspected"
failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a collision
and notifications on the Mazda app.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The stuck-open coolant control valve can cause the engine to overheat, leading to premature wear, damage, or even engine failure, which can result in costly repairs, decreased fuel efficiency, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The coolant control valve stays open

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive oil consumption can cause premature wear on engine components, lead to engine damage, and increase the risk of engine failure, which can result in costly repairs, decreased fuel efficiency, and increased risk of accidents.
The faulty battery can cause the vehicle to stall or not start, leaving the driver stranded, and potentially leading to accidents or safety risks.
symptoms: The battery will not hold a proper charge after the vehicle is shut off
requiring frequent jump-starts or carrying a jump pack.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Airbag Malfunction due to Wiring Issue under Seat
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty wiring can cause the airbag malfunctioning alarm to go off, and potentially lead to the airbag deploying randomly or not deploying at all in the event of a collision, which can increase the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: Adjusting the seat causes the "Airbag Malfunctioning" alarm/notification to go off
indicating a potential issue with the airbag system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle or transfer case can cause the all-wheel-drive system to malfunction, leading to loss of traction and control, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially in adverse weather conditions.
symptoms: Humming or whining noise coming from the rear of the vehicle

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature wear of suspension components, such as shocks and struts, can lead to uneven tire wear, reduced handling, and compromised safety, especially when driving at high speeds or in emergency maneuvers.
symptoms: noise or vibration when driving over bumps
